tour du poteau m (plural tours du poteau)

  1. the act of crossing an international border, generally for a very short period of time, in order to renew a visa or other government-issued permit before crossing back
    Je dois faire le tour du poteau d'ici mai afin de renouveler mon permis de travail.
    I need to cross the border between now and May in order to renew my work permit.
trans: the act of crossing an international border, generally for a very short period of time, in order to renew a visa or other government-issued permit before crossing back
